remarks: A functor maps each identity to the corresponding identity in the target category.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
funcid.b $e |- B = ( Base ` D ) $.
funcid.1 $e |- .1. = ( Id ` D ) $.
funcid.i $e |- I = ( Id ` E ) $.
funcid.f $e |- ( ph -> F ( D Func E ) G ) $.
funcid.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
funcid $p |- ( ph -> ( ( X G X ) ` ( .1. ` X ) ) = ( I ` ( F ` X ) ) ) $.
